snippet.title: Early Access Trailer | Thrive: Heavy Lies The Crown | City Builder
snippet.description:
Thrive: Heavy Lies The Crown is pleased to announce our confirmed Early Access launch date of 6 November 2024 on Steam!

Thrive is a medieval fantasy city-builder with multiplayer combat and impactful decision-making. As a new ruler, you and the survivors of Aldamor travel to the curious land of Nysamor in search of a new home.

Whether enterprising into the world on your own or with your friends, you’ll work to raise up a great kingdom and define your legacy.

WISHLIST ON STEAM NOW: https://thrivehltc.go.link/2JjKQ 

Make sure you join our official Discord to stay up to date - https://discord.gg/thrivehltc

Social Links:
Thrive: Heavy Lies the Crown Website - https://thrivehltc.com
TikTok - https://tiktok.com/@thrivehltc 
X/Twitter - https://twitter.com/thrivehltc
Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/thrivehltc
Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/thrivehltc

Find out more about PlaySide Publishing on its official website: https://www.playsidestudios.com/publishing

To learn more about Zugalu Entertainment, please visit its official website:
https://zugalu.com

#indiedev #indiegame #medievalfantasy #citybuilder #gamedev
